short_summary: Bedding Plants needed for historical site
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 17, 2022 at 1200 MST. All bids submitted after 1200 MST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Parks Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of Bedding Plants for the historical site, Cascade of Time Gardens in Banff National Park.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
5P421-222049 Bedding Plants
Plantes de garniture

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**:  WS3679903749-Doc3696231040
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3679903749
* **Publiction Date**: 2022-11-01
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-17T14:00:00 (Note: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 17, 2022 at 1200 MST.)

## Requirements

Parks Canada requires the supply and delivery of Bedding Plants for the historical site, Cascade of Time Gardens in Banff National Park.

## Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2022-10-31
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-06-26

## Tenders Response

Tenders must be submitted according to the following requirements:
* Respondents must be aware of all associated policies, procedures, and regulations governing this tender process.
* Bid submission must include all required supporting documentation.

## Evaluation Criteria
The contract will be awarded on the basis of the lowest price.

## Contact Information
The contact person for this tender opportunity is Ben Wong (SPAC/PSPC) at:
* Phone: None
* Email: ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact Address: None
* Contact Province/Country: None

## Notice URL
You can find more information about this opportunity at:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14519224?extsite=MTQ1MTkyMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that this contract opportunity is closed. The closing date was already exceeded. The information is being provided for historical purposes only.

## Business Classification Codes
* **G-IACN**:  None
* **UNSPSC**: 10161600
